text:
The force was with Kendall Jenner and model sisters Bella and Gigi Hadid as they re-enacted their favourite scenes from Star Wars movies for a new out-of-this-world photoshoot.

The stunners joined Taylor Hill and Kaia Gerber for Harper’s Bazaar’s 150th anniversary collector’s edition pictorial, illustrated by celebrated Star Wars artist Brian Rood.

So this happend in the studio last month…. #lovemyjob… https://t.co/Z24Accn3tH — Brian Rood (@broodone) November 7, 2017

Kendall was inspired by A New Hope for her photo, while the Hadids and Kaia went back to the dark side for The Empire Strikes Back.

Rood says, “(The editors) went through some of the story books that I had done and picked out some of their favourite iconic scenes from the Star Wars films, with backgrounds everybody felt familiar with that you’ve seen a million times, and they had a list of the models in those scenes that they wanted with the outfits they wanted.

“(I had to) kind of replace Luke with Kendall Jenner… So that’s kind of how that evolved.”
title: Making nerd dreams come true: Kendall Jenner, Gigi Hadid pose for 'Star Wars' shoot
